Method Detail

parseJSONEnvelope

public static org.json.JSONTokener parseJSONEnvelope(BufferedReader br)
                                              throws InterruptedException
Parse all the vertices from the JSON retreived from Rexster. Inspired by the implementation of the JSONObject class.

Parameters:
br - buffer over the HTTP response content
Returns:
JSONTokener tokener over the HTTP JSON. Null in case the results array is empty.
Throws:
InterruptedException

getSplits

public static List<org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.InputSplit> getSplits(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.JobContext context,
                                                                     long estimation)
                                                              throws IOException,
                                                                     InterruptedException
Splitter used by both Vertex and Edge Input Format.

Parameters:
context - The job context
estimation - Number of estimated objects
Returns:
splits to be generated to read the input
Throws:
IOException
InterruptedException

openRexsterStream

protected static BufferedReader openRexsterStream(org.apache.giraph.conf.ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration conf,
                                                  long start,
                                                  long end,
                                                  String urlSuffix,
                                                  String gremlinScript)
                                           throws InterruptedException
Opens an HTTP connection to the specified Rexster server.

Parameters:
conf - giraph configuration
start - start index of the Rexster page split
end - end index of the Rexster page split
urlSuffix - stream type (vertices or edges) needed for the REST Url
gremlinScript - gremlin script. If set to null, will be ignored.
Returns:
BufferedReader the object used to retrieve the HTTP response content
Throws:
InterruptedException
